short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lea is a prospecting tool, reserved to Asteya's agents to help them obtain leads information and send them to various platforms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lea is a prospecting tool, reserved to Asteya's agents to help them obtain leads information effectively and send them to various platforms they use.
